title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python bindings for running Llama, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official PyPI package providing Python bindings to interact with the Ollama server.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official npm package offering JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration enabling Ollama models as LLM and embeddings providers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with file upload, multimodal, and code highlighting.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with Ollama models directly in Discord channels.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistence support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration that forwards Slack messages to Ollama and streams responses back.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java SDK for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline code completion copilots.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that spins up Ollama containers for testing.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector enabling BPMN service tasks to call Ollama models.
